verses.verse: <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> and was <S%G1330>passing<s%> through <S%G2410>Jericho.<s%>

<S%G2532%G99999>There<s%> was a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3686><s%> <S%G2564>named<s%> <S%G2532>Zacchaeus.<s%> <S%G846>He<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> a chief tax <S%G754>collector,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3778>he<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4145>rich.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G4390>ran<s%> on <S%G1715>ahead,<s%> and climbed <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> a sycamore <S%G4809>tree<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> he <S%G3195>was<s%> to <S%G1330>pass<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G1223>way.<s%>

<S%G5613>When<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G5117>place,<s%> he <S%G1492>looked<s%> <S%G308>up<s%> and <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2195>"Zacchaeus,<s%> <S%G4692>hurry<s%> and come <S%G2597>down,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G4594>today<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3306>stay<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3624>house.<s%>"
<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G4692>hurried,<s%> came <S%G2597>down,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5264>received<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5463>joyfully.<s%>

<S%G2532>When<s%> they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G537>it,<s%> they all <S%G1234>murmured,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3754><s%> "He has <S%G1525>gone<s%> in to <S%G2647>lodge<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> who is a <S%G268>sinner.<s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G2195>Zacchaeus<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2255>half<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5224>goods<s%> I <S%G1325>give<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> I have <S%G4811>wrongfully<s%> <S%G4811>exacted<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%> of <S%G591>anyone,<s%> I restore four times as <S%G5073>much.<s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G4594>"Today,<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> has <S%G1096>come<s%> to <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3624>house,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G2530><s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>

<S%G1161>As<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> he went <S%G4369>on<s%> and <S%G2036>told<s%> a <S%G3850>parable,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1511>was<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1380>supposed<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> would <S%G3195>be<s%> <S%G398>revealed<s%> <S%G3916>immediately.<s%>

He <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G5100>"A<s%> <S%G444>certain<s%> <S%G2104>nobleman<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3117>far<s%> <S%G5561>country<s%> to <S%G2983>receive<s%> for <S%G1438>himself<s%> a <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G5290>return.<s%>

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> of <S%G1438>his,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> mina <S%G3414>coins,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>told<s%> <S%G4314><s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G4231><s%> 'Conduct business <S%G2193>until<s%> I <S%G2064>come.<s%>'

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4177>citizens<s%> <S%G3404>hated<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> an <S%G4242>envoy<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2309><s%> 'We <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G2309>want<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> man to <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G2248>us.<s%>'

<S%G2532>"It<s%> <S%G1096>happened<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> he <S%G846>had<s%> come <S%G1880>back<s%> <S%G2983>again,<s%> having received the <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> <S%G2532>that<s%> he <S%G2036>commanded<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G1401>servants,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> he had <S%G1325>given<s%> the <S%G694>money,<s%> to be <S%G5455>called<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G5101>they<s%> had gained by conducting <S%G1281>business.<s%>

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G3854>came<s%> before <S%G3004>him,<s%> saying, <S%G2962><s%> 'Lord, <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3414>mina<s%> has made <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G4333>more<s%> <S%G3414>minas.<s%>'

<S%G2532>"He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2095><s%> 'Well <S%G18>done,<s%> you good <S%G1401>servant!<s%> <S%G3754>Because<s%> you <S%G1096>were<s%> found <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> very <S%G1646>little,<s%> <S%G2468>you<s%> shall <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G4172>cities.<s%>'
<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2532>"The<s%> <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4675><s%> 'Your <S%G2962>mina,<s%> Lord, has <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G3414>minas.<s%>'
<S%G1161>"So<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G5129>him,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> 'And <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G1096>are<s%> to <S%G2532>be<s%> <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G4172>cities.<s%>'

<S%G1223%G99999>Then<s%> <S%G1223>why<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G1325>you<s%> <S%G1325>deposit<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G694>money<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G5132>bank,<s%> and <S%G2532>at<s%> <S%G1473>my<s%> <S%G2064>coming,<s%> <S%G846>I<s%> might have <S%G4238>earned<s%> <S%G5110>interest<s%> <S%G4862>on<s%> <S%G302>it?<s%>'

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to those <S%G3588>who<s%> stood <S%G3936>by,<s%> <S%G142><s%> 'Take the <S%G3414>mina<s%> away <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> it to him <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G3414>minas.<s%>'

<S%G1063><s%> 'For I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> to <S%G3956>everyone<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2192>has,<s%> will more be <S%G1325>given;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>him<s%> who <S%G3361>doesn't<s%> <S%G2192>have,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> which he <S%G2192>has<s%> will be taken <S%G142>away<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G4133>But<s%> <S%G71>bring<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> of <S%G3450>mine<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G3361>didn't<s%> <S%G2309>want<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> to <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5602>here,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2695>kill<s%> them <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G3450>me.<s%>'"
<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2036>Having<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G4198>things,<s%> he went on <S%G1715>ahead,<s%> going <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%G2532>It<s%> <S%G1096>happened,<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> he drew <S%G1448>near<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G967>Bethsphage<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G963>Bethany,<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G3735>mountain<s%> that is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1636>Olivet,<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>

<S%G2036>saying,<s%> "Go <S%G5217>your<s%> way <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2968>village<s%> on the <S%G2713>other<s%> <S%G1722>side,<s%> in <S%G3739>which,<s%> as you <S%G1531>enter,<s%> you will <S%G2147>find<s%> a <S%G4454>colt<s%> <S%G1210>tied,<s%> <S%G1909>whereon<s%> <S%G4455>no<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> ever <S%G3739>yet<s%> <S%G2523>sat.<s%> <S%G3089>Untie<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> and bring <S%G71>it.<s%>
<S%G1161>Those<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> were sent <S%G649>went<s%> <S%G1161>away,<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> things just <S%G2531>as<s%> he had <S%G2036>told<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G1161>As<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G3089>untying<s%> the <S%G4454>colt,<s%> its <S%G2962>owners<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5101>"Why<s%> are you <S%G3089>untying<s%> the <S%G4454>colt?<s%>"

<S%G1161>As<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G4198>went,<s%> they <S%G5291>spread<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2440>cloaks<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3598>way.<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2127>"Blessed<s%> is the <S%G935>King<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord!<s%> <S%G1515>Peace<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5310>highest!<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G5100>Some<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3101>disciples!<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2036>"I<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> were <S%G4623>silent,<s%> the <S%G3037>stones<s%> would cry <S%G2896>out.<s%>"
<S%G2532><s%> <S%G5613>When<s%> he drew <S%G1448>near,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> and <S%G2799>wept<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%>

<S%G3754>saying,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G2532>you,<s%> even <S%G2532>you,<s%> had <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3778><s%> <S%G4675><s%> <S%G2250>today<s%> <S%G1065>the<s%> <S%G3588>things<s%> which belong <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G1515>peace!<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> they are <S%G2928>hidden<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3788>eyes.<s%>

<S%G3754>For<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> will <S%G2240>come<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G4571>you,<s%> <S%G2532>when<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> will <S%G4016>throw<s%> up a <S%G5482>barricade<s%> against <S%G4671>you,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4033>surround<s%> <S%G4571>you,<s%> <S%G4033><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4912>hem<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G4912>in<s%> on every <S%G3840>side,<s%>
